trans-unit.source: Used to mark a type definition in an assembly as a user-defined type (UDT) in SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 用于将标记在为 SQL Server 中的用户定义类型 (UDT) 的程序集中的类型定义。

trans-unit.source: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 在特性上的属性反映在该类型注册使用 SQL Server 时使用的物理特征。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server creates a user-defined type that is bound to the type definition that has the SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 创建绑定到具有 SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute 自定义属性的类型定义的用户定义的类型。

trans-unit.source: Every UDT must be annotated with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 每个 UDT 必须使用此属性批注过。

trans-unit.source: See [CLR User-Defined Types](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028) for more information about UDTs, including an example of a UDT.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[clr 用户定义类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028)有关 Udt 的详细信息，包括 UDT 的示例。

trans-unit.source: A required attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to confirm that the given type is a UDT and to indicate the storage format of the UDT.
trans-unit.target: 必需的特性上的用户定义的类型 (UDT)，用于确认给定的类型是 UDT 并指示用户定义的类型的存储格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies that the `Format` of the user-defined type is `SerializedDataWithMetadata`and the`MaxByteSize` is 8000 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例指定`Format`的用户定义类型`SerializedDataWithMetadata`和`MaxByteSize`为 8000 个字节。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"></xref> values representing the serialization format of the type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"></xref>表示类型的序列化格式的值。

trans-unit.source: The serialization format as a <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 序列化格式为<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"></xref> value representing the serialization format.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format"> </xref>值，该值表示序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user-defined type is byte ordered.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户定义的类型是否为字节进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user-defined type is byte ordered; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户定义的类型是字节进行排序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether all instances of this user-defined type are the same length.
trans-unit.target: 指示此用户定义类型的所有实例都是否具有相同的长度。

trans-unit.source: If set to `true`, all instances of UDTs corresponding to this common language runtime (CLR) type must have a length in bytes exactly equal to <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.MaxByteSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为`true`，Udt 对应于此公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型的所有实例必须都具有长度以字节为单位完全等于<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.MaxByteSize%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute.MaxByteSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only relevant for UDTs with `UserDefined` serialization <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才是相关与 Udt 的`UserDefined`序列化<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all instances of this type are the same length; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此类型的所有实例都都具有相同的长度;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the instance, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 实例，以字节为单位的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: You must specify the MaxByteSize property with the `UserDefined` serialization <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定了 MaxByteSize 属性与`UserDefined`序列化<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>

trans-unit.source: When connecting to SQL Server 2005 or earlier, MaxByteSize must be between 1 and 8000.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到 SQL Server 2005 或更早版本，MaxByteSize 必须介于 1 和 8000 之间。

trans-unit.source: When connecting to SQL Server 2008 or later, set MaxByteSize between 1 and 8000, for a type whose instances are always 8,000 bytes or less.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到 SQL Server 2008 或更高版本，介于 1 和 8000 之间设置 MaxByteSize 类型其实例始终为 8000 个字节或更小。

trans-unit.source: For types that can have instances larger than 8000, specify -1.
trans-unit.target: 对于可以具有大于 8000 实例的类型，指定-1。

trans-unit.source: For a UDT with user-defined serialization specified, MaxByteSize refers to the total size of the UDT in its serialized form as defined by the user.
trans-unit.target: 对于与指定的用户定义的序列化 UDT 中,，MaxByteSize 是指在其序列化的窗体中 UDT 的总大小由用户定义。

trans-unit.source: Consider a UDT with a property of a string of 10 characters (<xref:System.Char>).
trans-unit.target: 考虑这样一个 UDT 属性值为 10 个字符的字符串 (<xref:System.Char>)。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: When the UDT is serialized using a <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>, the total size of the serialized string is 22 bytes: 2 bytes per Unicode UTF-16 character, multiplied by the maximum number of characters, plus 2 control bytes of overhead incurred from serializing a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的类型使用序列化时<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>、 序列化的字符串的总大小是每个 Unicode utf-16 字符，最大字符数的乘积 22 字节︰ 2 字节以及 2 控件个字节的开销产生从序列化二进制流。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: So, when determining the value of MaxByteSize, the total size of the serialized UDT must be considered: the size of the data serialized in binary form plus the overhead incurred by serialization.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在确定 MaxByteSize 的值时，序列化的 UDT 的总大小必须考虑︰ 的大小以二进制格式序列化的数据加上序列化所需的开销。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be used with `Native` serialization <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不应该用于`Native`序列化<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>.</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value representing the maximum size of the instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示实例的最大大小。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server name of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。

trans-unit.source: The Name property is not used within SQL Server, but is used by the Microsoft Visual Studio .NET Integrated Development Environment (IDE).
trans-unit.target: Name 属性不使用 SQL Server 中，但使用通过 Microsoft Visual Studio.NET 集成开发环境 (IDE)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing the SQL Server name of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值表示用户定义类型的 SQL Server 名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: 用于验证用户定义类型的实例方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The method specified by this attribute validates instances of the UDT when the UDT has been deserialized from a binary value that is not trusted.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制值不受信任反序列化用户定义的类型之后，通过此属性指定的方法验证 UDT 的实例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示用于验证用户定义类型的实例方法的名称。</xref:System.String>
